result.html: chuaigh siad i mo theanntaThey went along with me.

result.eng: Submit the documents along with the application.

result.eng: My wife [who is expecting a child] is getting along well this time.
result.ga: tá mo bhean ag coinneáil go maith an babhta seo

result.eng: I get along well with the other people.
result.ga: réitím go maith leis na daoine eile

result.html: réitím go maith leis na daoine eileI get along well with the other people.

result.eng: I don't get along well with the other people.

result.orig: ní réitím go maith leis na daoine eile

result.eng: Along with taking care of the child she had to clean the house.
result.ga: fara aire a thabhairt don leanbh bhí uirthi an teach a ghlanadh
result.orig: fara aire a thabhairt don leanbh bhí uirthi an teach a ghlanadh
result.html: fara aire a thabhairt don leanbh bhí uirthi an teach a ghlanadhAlong with taking care of the child she had to clean the house.
result.ponchtml: fara aire a ṫaḃairt don leanḃ ḃí uirṫi an teaċ a ġlanaḋAlong with taking care of the child she had to clean the house.

result.eng: She wasn't allowed to eat along with the family.
result.ga: níor ligeadh di a cuid a ithe i gcuideachta an teaghlaigh
